meanings.definition: An antifungal medication used to treat fungal infections of the skin, hair, and nails.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed griseofulvins to clear up the fungal infection on my skin.
meanings.sent2: She applied griseofulvins to her nails to get rid of the fungus.
meanings.sent3: The griseofulvins danced on my skin, fighting off the pesky fungus.
meanings.sent4: Like a warrior, griseofulvins battled the fungal invaders on my nails.
meanings.sent5: The power of griseofulvins banished the fungal infection from my skin completely.

meanings.definition: The class of antifungal drugs to which griseofulvins belong.
meanings.sent1: Griseofulvins are part of the group of antifungal medications used to treat infections.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often rely on griseofulvins and similar drugs to combat fungal issues.
meanings.sent3: In the world of antifungal drugs, griseofulvins are like the superheroes.
meanings.sent4: The family of antifungal drugs, including griseofulvins, stood united against infections.
meanings.sent5: Among antifungal medications, griseofulvins shine as a crucial player in treatment.
